code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic d,
    input logic r,
    output logic q
);
    always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
        if (r) begin
            q <= 1'b0;  // Reset output to 0
        end else begin
            q <= d;     // Latch data input
        end
    end
endmodule
```
